item.description:
We'll celebrate February birthdays here. If you don't have fun here, then I've failed as an organizer!!!

You'll get CAKE...I'm offering 5 great things in a RAFFLE, and will be handing out fun and funny DOOR PRIZES, too! AND I have FREE appetizer coupons!

So come on...don't be a party pooper! RSVP by Thurs, Feb 8th!

Friday's was just remodeled and their bar area is just great!

I hope to get the room to the left of the bar. Look for me, I'll be the one with the PARTY HAT! At the door, ask for the "birthday party."

Happy hour prices at the bar 5 - 7 pm, 10 to close. Great menu too!

group.name: Connecticut Theatre Group Arts-Theater Events Group Discount

item.name: February Happy Hour at T.G.I. Friday's
